scripts.android:server: npm run android:server:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=android-server webpack --env.cjs && npm run android:server:start
scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.compile: npm run server:compile && npm run client:compile
scripts.client:watch: npm run client:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=client webpack --progress --env.umd --watch
scripts.client:build: npm run client:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=client webpack --progress --env.umd --env.production
scripts.client:compile: npm run client:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=client webpack --progress --env.umd
scripts.amd:common:dev: npm run amd:common:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=amd-common webpack --progress --env.cjs --watch
scripts.amd:common:compile: npm run amd:common:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=amd-common webpack --progress --env.cjs
scripts.amd:common:build: npm run amd:common:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=amd-common webpack --progress --env.cjs --env.production
scripts.server:build: npm run server:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=server webpack --env.cjs --env.production
scripts.server:compile: npm run server:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=server webpack --env.cjs
scripts.server: npm run server:clean && npm run amd:compile && cross-env NODE_MODULE=server webpack --env.cjs && npm run server:start
